Host on GitHub | Hugo echo "site/" >> .gitignore git checkout --orphan gh-pages git reset --hard git commit --allow-empty -m "Initializing gh-pages branch" git push origin gh-pages git checkout master rm -rf site git worktree add -B gh-pages site origin/gh-pages Use the following script ( deploy.sh ) to deploy on GitHub Pages. deploy script ¶ Gulp tasks ¶ npm install --save gulp npm install --save gulp-htmlmin npm install --save gulp-clean-css # gulpfile . js const gulp = require ( 'gulp' ); const htmlmin = require ( 'gulp-htmlmin' ); const cleanCSS = require ( 'gulp-clean-css' ); gulp . task ( 'minify-html' , () => { return gulp . src ( 'site/**/*.html' ) . pipe ( htmlmin ({ collapseWhitespace : true , removeComments : true })) . pipe ( gulp . dest ( 'site' )) }) gulp . task ( 'minify-css' , () => { return gulp . src ( 'site/assets/stylesheets/**/*.css' ) . pipe ( cleanCSS ({}, function ( details ) { console . log ( details . name + ': ' + details . stats . originalSize + ' -> ' + details . stats . minifiedSize ); })) . pipe ( gulp . dest ( 'site/assets/stylesheets' )); }); Create package.json ¶ 必要なパッケージを package.json に書き込む。 npm init パッケージの再インストールは npm install MathJax ¶ PyMdown - Material for MkDocs この設定に変える必要あり。現在は下でやってる。2018/10/3 MathJax with MkDocs Install ¶ pip install python-markdown-math Example code ¶ $$ P \c dot Q = \| P \|\| Q \|\c os \a lpha $$ Example rendering ¶ P\cdot Q = \|P\|\|Q\|\cos\alpha CodeHilite ¶ CodeHilite - Material for MkDocs Supported languages - Pygments Setup ¶ pip install pygments pip install prompt-toolkit == 1 .0.15 To enable CodeHilite, add the following lines to your mkdocs.yml : markdown_extensions: - codehilite Footnote ¶ Footnotes - Material for MkDocs markdown_extensions: - footnotes Footnote example 1. 1 Footnote example 2. 2 1行ならこのように。 ↩ 複数行は このように。 ↩
